main.speaker: Receptionist
main.text: That is the new position our company psychologist was requesting because she was getting overworked. If you haven't met her yet, she's a lovely person but a bit stressed lately because of her workload.
Hopefully I can help her relieve some stress by taking on some of that workload if I get accepted.

main.speaker: Receptionist
main.text: I hope so for you and for her. Mr, Jefferson should be in Room 278 on the second floor. If you take the stairs, it should be on your right.
Alright, thank you and have a nice day!
